issue.message: This declaration is opt-in and its usage should be marked with '@androidx.camera.camera2.interop.ExperimentalCamera2Interop' or '@OptIn(markerClass = androidx.camera.camera2.interop.ExperimentalCamera2Interop.class)'

issue.errorLine1: @RequiresApi(21) // TODO(b/200306659): Remove and replace with annotation on package-info.java
